bike.description: Specialized FACT 7r N'Aero tube shaping, triple monocoque construction, compact aero geometry, vertical seat adjustment, OS BB

components.description: Specialized FACT N'Aero carbon, monocoque construction, 1" steerer
Specialized 1" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge bearings w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Pro-Set stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm handlebar clamp, 4-position adjustable
Chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
